\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale={0.5}]
\begin{groupplot}[group style={group size={2 by 2}}]
    \nextgroupplot[colormap name={Blues}]
    \addplot3[surf, point meta={y}, samples={13}]
        {cos(deg(x)) * sin(deg(y))};
    \nextgroupplot[colormap name={Greens}]
    \addplot3[surf, point meta={y}, samples={13}]
        {cos(deg(x)) * sin(deg(y))};
    \nextgroupplot[colormap name={Oranges}]
    \addplot3[surf, point meta={y}, samples={13}]
        {cos(deg(x)) * sin(deg(y))};
    \nextgroupplot[colormap name={Purples}]
    \addplot3[surf, point meta={y}, samples={13}]
        {cos(deg(x)) * sin(deg(y))};
\end{groupplot}
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
